post.author: 권칠환
post.content:
Hello,

My name is Diane Browne and I work for Keane Canada, an IT Consulting firm (www.Keane.com). We are currently looking for a strong Application Support Analyst. Our records show that you are a possible match for this requirement. If you are available, interested or planning to make a change, please send me an email. Thank you very much.

Sincerely,

Diane Browne
Sr. Technical Recruiter
Keane, Inc
Diane_E_Browne@keane.com


KEANE IS HIRING

Keane is hiring for our Advanced Development Ctr. in Markham, Ontario.

Level 2 Application Support

To work in supporting financial applications in a Enterprize environment. This position calls for very strong SQL, TSQL, Perl and basic Unix skills as well as Very Strong Database management experience on Sybase or SQL. The engineer will be responsible for DB performance management for all Sybase production databases. Should have thorough understanding of database design and should be able to interpret stored procedures and transact SQL programming.

Must have:

MS-SQL

TSQL

RDBMS (any)

Perl

Shell Scripting

Basic Unix

Excellent written and verbal skills.

Strong Analytical skills

..

Nice to have:

Strong understanding of web server technologies (IIS 6.0). Would be nice to have experience in setting up application websites including deploying code on IIS servers.

Strong TCP/IP troubleshooting skills . Basic networking knowledge.

Good understanding of MQ. Basic administration

Understanding of SOAP

Basic .net c#

Basic Unix administration

Basic Windows 2000 administration


Basic understanding of the following :

FTP, HTTP, HTTPS,TCP/IP, SSH, Unix shell: Korne, NFS, NAS, NIS

Desired/transferable:

Help Desk Experience, Operations Support; Informatica; Autosys; Basic VCS clustering knowledge

Shift Information

Shift 1 - 8am to 5pm

Shift 2 - 4pm to 1am

Shift 3 - 12am to 9am

Hours (different than regular?): ___N _X__ Y Specify:

Yes, The hours will be consistent but will be assigned to shift work. Also, project coverage is 7 days per week. While each resource is only scheduled 5 days per week, this individual would likely be regularly assigned 1 weekend day. This is a US based client which operates 365 days per year. The team is required to provide on site coverage on all holidays (including Christmas day) and this individual could be assigned on any or all of those days, with another day off.


Being a member of the Keane team will give you the ability to work from Markham, Ontario on projects for International Fortune 500 companies. Enjoy a top-notch benefits package, active Social Club, on-going company-paid training and more! Come be a part of Keane's continued growth and success in the Canadian IT marketplace!

If you do not want to receive future announcements of career opportunities with Keane, just let me know by replying to this e-mail. I will remove you from our mailing list.



If you would like to unsubscribe, please click here.



Lookup Candidate
post.title: Application Support for Keane Canada in Markham, Ontario
